responses: Don't hesitate to reach out to your family!
You are always free to express your true feeling!
You deserve care as well. It's not just about the baby.
lack of energy, loss of interest, trouble sleeping, feeling self-blame, feeling anxious about the baby.

patterns: how are ways to help myself
how are some advice for treatments
responses: The first suggestion is to look for doctors and professional advice. Meanwhile, from many past experience and advice from mothers, spending more time on yourself is a great way for self-help. Here is a list of things that you could try on to relieve your stress and anxiety: origami, take a walk, painting, picking up an instrument, meditation...or anything that you enjoy~

patterns: how to connect with my family
how should I connect with my family
should I connect with my family
responses: If you feel comfortable, definitely share your feelings and symptoms with your loved ones.
Connecting with them could also help distract your attention from the negativity. No hesitation to seek encouragement from them!
